experiment_info.name: coarse_to_fine_temporal
experiment_info.description: Progressive temporal fidelity: start with 20% timesteps, gradually increase to 40%
experiment_info.hypothesis: Starting with very coarse temporal resolution for initial search, then refining, may be faster

tuning_runs.note: 20% timesteps too coarse - poor candidate selection leads to bad final RMSE

final_result.reason: Score 1.1266 is 3.6% worse than baseline 1.1688. 20% timesteps don't correlate well enough with full simulation.
